{"question":"Sean A y B dos sucesos aleatorios con:
P(A) = 3/8
P(B) = 1/2
P(A ∩ B) = 1/4

1. P(A U B)
2. P(A')
3. P(B')
4. P(A' ∩ B')
5. P(A ∩ B')
6. P(A' U B')
7. P(B ∩ A')
","answers":["7/8","5/8","1/2","5/16","1/4","13/16","5/16"]}
